thread.title: Convenient for Theater Visit, But Not Great
thread.title_full: Convenient for Theater Visit, But Not Great - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 4journey
title: Convenient for Theater Visit, But Not Great
text:
I frequently stay at Hilton properties and have stayed at others in New York City. While the room was clean and the discounted HH price was reasonable, our room on the second floor was extremely noisy due to the proximity of the air handler. In addition, the mattresses were rather soft and could have used more support.
So, if the location works for you, great. Just make sure you have a few floors between you and the air handlers.
